[File: consensus/src/transaction_shuffler/use_case_aware/delayed_queue.rs] [Error Handling] [Panic Propagation] Can panics from strict_insert/strict_remove propagate up to consensus layer, and are they caught properly to prevent validator crash? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/transaction_shuffler/use_case_aware/delayed_queue.rs] [Atomicity] [Queue Operations] Can queue_txn() leave data structures in inconsistent state if it panics after modifying some but not all structures? (High)
